headline: Trump’s Impeachment Defense Team Takes Shape as Trial in Senate Looms
abstract: The basic configuration of the president’s defense team has been established, but other aspects have yet to be determined.
lead_paragraph: For weeks, President Trump’s advisers have been preparing for the eventuality of an impeachment trial in the Senate, a process that could begin as soon as Wednesday.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
